title: Fulsome Fusillade
data:
***Version [0.32](/0.32 "0.32")**: This article is up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup*.*

| [![Fulsome fusillade.png](/images/0/0f/Fulsome_fusillade.png)](/File:Fulsome_fusillade.png) Fulsome Fusillade |                                                                                                                                     |
| :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                                         | 8                                                                                                                                   |
| School1                                                                                                       | [Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy")                                                                                                       |
| School2                                                                                                       | [Conjuration](/Conjurations "Conjurations")                                                                                         |
| Source(s)                                                                                                     | [Book of Spectacle](/Book_of_Spectacle "Book of Spectacle") [Book of Transmutation](/Book_of_Transmutation "Book of Transmutation") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                   | 8                                                                                                                                   |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                     | 0                                                                                                                                   |
| Power Cap                                                                                                     | 200                                                                                                                                 |
| Range                                                                                                         | 8                                                                                                                                   |
| Flags                                                                                                         | Area, Chaotic, Destructive                                                                                                          |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A magnum opus of reckless chemistry, this spell conjures up a surfeit of volatile reagents to rain down upon your enemies. For the next several turns, up to 3 random enemies in sight will be struck by an exploding beaker that inflicts either fire, cold, electric, or poison damage. If any of these explosions overlap each other, the resulting reaction will inflict even greater irresistible damage and sometimes apply a random deleterious status on whoever is caught in the blast.This spell costs a small amount of the caster's magical energy each turn to maintain, and while it will never aim an explosion where it could hurt the caster, the caster's allies (and anything else in the general vicinity) are not so fortunate. |

**Fulsome Fusillade** is a level 8 [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")/[Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy") spell that gives you the Fusillade status, which causes beakers of random reagents to rain on nearby targets for each of the next 5 turns. Each turn, this causes 3x3 explosions of either [fire](/Fire "Fire"), [cold](/Cold "Cold"), [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity"), or poison-physical (70% poison, 30% physical) aimed on top of 3 random enemies. If any of those explosions overlap, the area of overlap is instead hit by a volatile alchemical reaction that deals a larger amount of non-elemental damage and has a chance to apply a random debuff.

Possible debuffs:

- [malmutate](/Malmutate "Malmutate")
- [slow](/Slow "Slow")
- [weakness](/Weakness "Weakness")
- [confusion](/Confusion "Confusion")
- [ensnare](/Ensnare "Ensnare")
- [petrify](/Petrify "Petrify")

The spell additionally drains 2 MP each turn except the first, and if you don't have enough MP left, the status ends.

## Useful Info

This spell will never hit you, although it will hit and anger your allies, so care should be taken using this spell around allies.

## Strategy

## History

- Added in [0.32](/0.32 "0.32") as the first Alchemy spell above level 6.
html:
Fulsome Fusillade

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.32: This article is up to date for the latest stable release of Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup.
 Fulsome Fusillade
Level 8
School1 Alchemy
School2 Conjuration
Source(s) Book of Spectacle
Book of Transmutation
Casting noise 8
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 200
Range 8
Flags Area, Chaotic, Destructive
A magnum opus of reckless chemistry, this spell conjures up a surfeit of volatile reagents to rain down upon your enemies. For the next several turns, up to 3 random enemies in sight will be struck by an exploding beaker that inflicts either fire, cold, electric, or poison damage. If any of these explosions overlap each other, the resulting reaction will inflict even greater irresistible damage and sometimes apply a random deleterious status on whoever is caught in the blast.

This spell costs a small amount of the caster's magical energy each turn to maintain, and while it will never aim an explosion where it could hurt the caster, the caster's allies (and anything else in the general vicinity) are not so fortunate.

Fulsome Fusillade is a level 8 Conjurations/Alchemy spell that gives you the Fusillade status, which causes beakers of random reagents to rain on nearby targets for each of the next 5 turns. Each turn, this causes 3x3 explosions of either fire, cold, electricity, or poison-physical (70% poison, 30% physical) aimed on top of 3 random enemies. If any of those explosions overlap, the area of overlap is instead hit by a volatile alchemical reaction that deals a larger amount of non-elemental damage and has a chance to apply a random debuff.

Possible debuffs:

  • malmutate
  • slow
  • weakness
  • confusion
  • ensnare
  • petrify

The spell additionally drains 2 MP each turn except the first, and if you don't have enough MP left, the status ends.

Useful Info

This spell will never hit you, although it will hit and anger your allies, so care should be taken using this spell around allies.

Strategy

History

  • Added in 0.32 as the first Alchemy spell above level 6.

rawPage:
{{version032}}
{{spell info}}

'''Fulsome Fusillade''' is a level 8 [[Conjurations]]/[[Alchemy]] spell that gives you the {{white|Fusillade}} status, which causes beakers of random reagents to rain on nearby targets for each of the next 5 turns. Each turn, this causes 3x3 explosions of either [[fire]], [[cold]], [[electricity]], or poison-physical (70% poison, 30% physical) aimed on top of 3 random enemies. If any of those explosions overlap, the area of overlap is instead hit by a volatile alchemical reaction that deals a larger amount of non-elemental damage and has a chance to apply a random debuff.

Possible debuffs:
*[[malmutate]]
*[[slow]]
*[[weakness]]
*[[confusion]]
*[[ensnare]]
*[[petrify]]

The spell additionally drains 2 MP each turn except the first, and if you don't have enough MP left, the status ends.

==Useful Info==
This spell will never hit you, although it will hit and anger your allies, so care should be taken using this spell around allies. 

==Strategy==

==History==
*Added in [[0.32]] as the first Alchemy spell above level 6.
